content.text: Hi there, My name is Ping Zhang and thank you for checking my page. I have been doing Front End developement for years, always looking for new things to learn with google as my best teacher.
I'm expertise in front-end  and back-end web development,  passion for solving problems, constantly perfecting owncraft, and producing work which can be proud of.

That's the reason I made this site, Hope you like it. 

Please follow the exit sign to check other pages.
